wikipedia_page.main: Sir Patrick Jeremy Walker, KCB (25 February 1932 – 13 October 2021) was a British civil servant who was Director General (DG) of MI5, the United Kingdom's internal security service, from 1988 to 1992.

response: *Sir Patrick Walker  (born 1932), former Director General of MI5
* Sir Patrick Walker (MI5 officer) (1932–2021), director general of MI5 1988–1991
